ygData.subject: RE: This weeks patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: They did test it. One of the things abashi said is that they weren t sure whether this ability would go in with this patch because the hide button was greyed
ygData.messageBody:
They did test it. One of the things abashi said is that they weren't sure
whether this ability would go in with this patch because the hide button was
greyed out during combat.

Draelon


-----Original Message-----
From: Bj rn Karlowsky [mailto:pille@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2000 4:32 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] This weeks patch message


From: =?iso-8859-1?Q?Bj=F6rn?= Karlowsky <pille@...>

Hello,

> - A new rogue-specific ability has been added to the "Hide" skill. It is
> called "Evade". This skill has the effect of lowering the amount that the
> targeted NPC hates the rogue, and has the potential of making the engaged
> NPC switch to another target (preferably a tank) within the rogue's group.
> It is essentially a "reverse taunt". This ability helps mitigate the
> negative effects of the rogue's exceedingly high damage-output potential.
It
> also will in-turn help the rogue do even more damage as the NPC is much
more
> likely to expose its back. It is engaged by targeting the NPC you wish to
> "Evade" and pressing the "Hide" button. As a note, you must not be in
combat
> mode in order to use this ability.

Ohoh....I bet my rogue friends will hate me once again because they
cannot evade while I sing a song!
And btw aren't the sneak/hide buttons inactive too when you get a hit?

I hope they tested it...
Tirc Stardancer.
